name: Mind of a newborn
description:
In this game, you play as a baby who is tired of the same type of life in the village and decides to go on a trip. Your task is to get out of the village.

Explore the location and enjoy the "numerous" game mechanics.

The game was made by Mr. Vanchik in 3 days at the game jam from the University of Manchester.

I liked this game and I want to finish it after the game jam. Thanks for the experience!

Control:

  WASD - walk

Mouse - camera control

Escape - cancel note
